features: WBM 5-in1 Ultra concentrated formula with natural lavender extracts help to keep the clothes smell great for long term.

WBM dirt washing pods work efficiently in all types of washing machine and dissolve in ay water temperature.
Laundry Pods comes with an Ultra Protective Zip lock bag that has 32 pods in each bag.
body.description: WBM laundry pods are made with natural plant extracts & essential oils. Detergent pods hold powerful cleaning formula with a multifunctional 3-cavity design. Deep cleaning protects the clothing element and saves fabric from damage.WBM laundry pods are a 5-in-1 breakthrough laundry solution with color protection, soft and skin-friendly, lasting fragrance, 3D stain removal, and quickly soluble in water that give you more bang for your buck. They pack holds efficient cleaning power in an innovative, three-chamber design, separating key ingredients until they hit the wash for maximum cleaning power. More than just a liquid in a pouch, these are formulated laundry packs reveal brightest clean yet. Its special film enables the multi-chamber technology to dissolve in both hot & cold water. WBM pods give rich suds. It targets tough stains and works in both high productivity and standard washing machines. WBM packs are safe for septic systems and, as always contain no phosphates. WBM laundry pods are specially designed free of dyes and artificial perfumes. Simply put in one pod for most loads, but use two pods for heavy and more loads. You can use three pods for extra-large loads.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WBM Laundry Detergent Pacs, Gentle and Suitable for All Fabrics and Washers Clean your laundry with WBM Home laundry detergent pods that work on tough stains. No need to use any additional fabric softeners or bleaches to clean your clothes. The laundry pods do their wonders through this 5-in-1 breakthrough formula. This breakthrough formula of the high-efficiency laundry pods is a perfect 3D stain remover, gentle and skin-friendly, soluble in water, and gives color protection and long-lasting freshness for long. Lavender laundry pods break down all food stains, grease, and grime from the laundry. The powerful cleaning formula of laundry detergent pods is based on natural extract oil and safe ingredients safe that work together for laundry cleaning tasks. Our laundry pods contain natural lavender oil that protects the elements of clothing and provides a long-lasting scent. These pods, being soft and skin-friendly, are 3D stain remover, soluble in water; provide color protection with lasting fragrance. The 3-chamber design of laundry cleaning pods is a deep cleaner for all fabric types with lavender scent infused in the pods, freshen every fabric type after washing with our pods that make your laundry cleaning more excited than before. Pods are compatible with all washers, both standard, and high-efficiency washing machines, and work well in all water temperatures, no matter whether that water is hot or cold.

Forget the hassle of buying different laundry detergents that care about the fabric as well as your skin. Our pods are formulated with powerful safe ingredients that are safe and natural for deep laundry cleaning, effectively remove tough stains, and eliminate odor like a laundry expert. Ideal for all Machine Types 5-in-1 pods are compatible with all washer types, like both high-efficiency and standard washing machines. If you are worried about our detergents working efficiency in different water temperatures, then relax & get out of worry because water temperature affects not on working efficiency of our laundry pods. What to Wash with Laundry Pods? High-efficiency laundry pods are ideal for all types of fabrics, like sweaters, delicate fabric, white and dark-colored clothes, baby clothes, and other home accessories. Put a detergent pod in the washer for a medium load and 2 pods for a heavy load, and then put all your dirty clothes to provide effective cleaning.

Detergent Pods, Scented & Safe For Skin WBM simplifies your life with quality laundry detergent pods that do every possible cleaning with a 5-in-1 breakthrough powerful cleaning formula. Lavender laundry pods wash all stains, grease, and grime from clothes. Being soluble in water, pods provide color protection with long-lasting freshness to your clothes. Clothes washed with our pods hold a refreshing scent that makes your mood happy and calm when you wear them. If you are worried about the out membrane solubility then let us tell you that the outer membrane is completely soluble in water. The whole pod dissolves in water so fast and easily.

WBM laundry pods are a 5-in-1 breakthrough laundry solution with color protection, soft and skin-friendly, lasting fragrance, 3D stain removal, and quickly soluble in water that gives you more bang for your buck. The pack holds efficient cleaning power in an innovative, three-chamber design, separating key ingredients until they hit the wash for maximum cleaning power. More than just a liquid in a pouch, these formulated laundry packs reveal the brightest clean yet. Its special film enables the multi-chamber technology to dissolve in both hot & cold water.

WBM Home Laundry pods come in a variety of scents and sizes, so you can choose the one that matches your style. The different sizes make it easier to use for smaller or larger loads of laundry. WBM laundry detergent is available in both liquid and Pods form

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these laundry pods and the smell of lavender and the fabric softener and I’m they do my towels and sheets very well and I love the way that it makes them smell and the amount you get for the price very reasonable highly recommend them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rose scented pods
reviews.reviewText: I like that it has everything in one pod, soap, softener, etc.Also I love the scent! On a personal point, its pink!🥰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cleans great but….
reviews.reviewText: Cleans great. Zero complaints. Only “complaint “ is there is no fragrance. Even before tossing in wash. But I would buy again because it does clean as it should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am huge on having my laundry smell amazing. I'm a massage therapist and I use many towels and it's important that they smell great and that my clients are happy. This laundry detergent does an outstanding job as far as softness and cleansing but I have to be honest that I didn't notice anything different as far as a scent goes. I was hoping the laundry would smell like lavender. It smelled very good but I couldn't tell the difference from using an inexpensive detergent. Again, the laundry was very soft and did smell good. I'm not sure if I'm allowed to say this or not but I do buy a laundry detergent here on Amazon by Tyler Candle Company. The scent is called diva. No I don't work for them and know this is not a plug for them, I'm just saying that that laundry detergent makes the clothes smell incredible but it's very costly. Anyway, I'm not unhappy or disappointed but I was hoping that there would be a difference as far as the smell of the laundry goes. Thank you for reading my review

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It smells very good and it melts easy and it makes laundry clean. Like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: When you first open the bag, they have a strong chemical smell, which I kind of thought would mean that they would be super good at cleaning. I did not find that to be the case, they were OK but I don’t feel like they perform better than my normal HE tide or HE gain detergent. The bag did tear after the first use, and I couldn’t really seal without using a paper clip or something to roll down the top of the bag and keep it sealed, there is really no noticeable fragrance other than the chemical smells so I’m going to have to go with I would not recommend these. I washed with smaller loads just to make sure that I gave it a fair shot and I can’t say that my clothes were cleaner or smell better or that this product outperform any thing I’ve used. I mean honestly I feel like the Gain and the Tide are much better cleaners. And I’m used to using the crystals for fragrance and these pods just can’t top those.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I finally got my order in and it was correct. I have both sense they are nice my favorite one is Rose. It dissolves nice and cleans your clothes well. It's not over powerful! Like but probably won't re-order!!
